statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 100 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 5 AND unit_price > 50.00;
DELETE FROM products WHERE id = 1 AND quantity > 0;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE total_price < 1000.00 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE quantity_ordered < 10 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
